name: unrushed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not done in a hurry, or not feeling that you must do something quickly: I got up in time to have an unrushed breakfast with my wife. She got everything ready the night before - she wanted to be calm and unrushed in the morning. Synonym
unhurriedOpposite
rushedRelated word
rush verb (GO/DO QUICKLY)
More examplesFewer examplesHis style - with his smoky voice and an unrushed pace - recalls that of other jazz legends.He wants time to develop new work in an unrushed way. We made a night of it with great food, service that was nice and leisurely, and unrushed conversation. Service is unrushed, informative, and friendly. We were totally unrushed, and spent hours eating, talking, and drinking.
